Html:
We have an organization listed under the updates category that we would like to remove, including all the products underneath.

The Delete button does not seem to do anything. Nor are there options for removal when I right click the organization/company.

1. Re-added an update to this organzation / company as there were none.
  2. Clicked decline button at right for this update.
  3. Clicked delete button at right.

First, ensure there is nomore updates in each product for the Company you want to delete. Then try to delete every product, one by one.
You need to run WPP locally on the Wsus server.
